inProgress.name: [Rework][UI] Redesign Tamagotchi wellness companion with custom art, animation, and personality
inProgress.description: Build a tamagotchi-style wellness companion for thepom.app that makes healthy scanning rewarding. Visual design: custom illustrated character (not emoji) with at least 5 states (hungry, satisfied, energized, sluggish, thriving). Reactions must reflect cumulative recent scan quality. Add real-time scan reactions, celebratory animation for clean products, gentle nudge animation for concerning products, customizable creature name, and brand-consistent color palette. FEEL target: Tamagotchi x Duolingo delight. QA gate: screenshot-based review must PASS for polish/professional quality before Done.
